articles.description: Gold And Silver Prices Today:10 gm of 24 carat gold was at Rs.67991.0 in Delhi whereas 1 kg of silver was Rs.76500.0 in Delhi.
articles.content: Gold And Silver Prices Today: Gold prices saw a slight increase on Sunday. The cost of 24 carat gold is Rs.6799.1 per gm, up by Rs.596.0. The cost of 22 carat gold is Rs.6228.0 per gm, up by Rs.546.0… [+2857 chars]
